items.input: Firm: Revelstoke Capital, Company: Evolve Med Spa

conversationHistory.content:
Find headquarters location for the portfolio company. Use perplexity_search to find city, state, and full address. Return JSON: {company_name, firm_name, headquarters_location: {city, state, full_address, research_confidence}}. Include no comments in your response.

Inputs:
input: Firm: Revelstoke Capital, Company: Evolve Med Spa

content.text: Let me search for Evolve Med Spa's headquarters location.

input.query: Evolve Med Spa headquarters location address Revelstoke Capital portfolio company

content.content:
{
  "content": [
    {
      "type": "text",
      "text": "Evolve Med Spa’s headquarters address is listed as 1025 Maxwell Ln, Hoboken, New Jersey 07030, United States.[1]  

- Additional corporate listing: Some directories also list a “corporate office” for Evolve Med Spa at 706 Grand St, Hoboken, NJ 07030, which may reflect an alternate or previous office address.[3]  
- Phone: 800-867-8015.[1][5]

Regarding Revelstoke Capital: Evolve Med Spa does not appear on Revelstoke Capital Partners’ published portfolio/investments pages, and I did not find confirmation that it is a Revelstoke portfolio company.[2][4] If you’re looking for a private equity backer, further verification from Evolve Med Spa’s own press releases or Revelstoke’s site would be needed.

Sources:
1. https://contactout.com/company/Evolve-Med-Spa-76422
2. https://www.revelstokecapital.com
3. https://www.zoominfo.com/pic/evolve-med-spa/529980418
4. https://www.revelstokecapital.com/investments/
5. https://www.bbb.org/us/nj/montclair/profile/medical-spa/evolve-med-spa-0221-90211031


(Results from Perplexity sonar-pro)"
    }
  ],
  "isError": false
}

input.query: Evolve Med Spa Revelstoke Capital acquisition ownership current status

content.content:
{
  "content": [
    {
      "type": "text",
      "text": "Evolve Med Spa was acquired by a private equity group in April 2024; the firm is now listed in Revelstoke Capital Partners’ investment portfolio, indicating Revelstoke is the owner/sponsor as of 2025.[1][5]

Key details:
- Viper Partners disclosed it served as exclusive sell-side advisor on the acquisition of Evolve Med Spa by a private equity group, announced April 5, 2024.[1][3]
- Revelstoke Capital Partners’ official portfolio page includes “Evolve Med Spa,” confirming Revelstoke’s involvement and current ownership/sponsorship status as of 2025 (site footer shows © 2025).[5]

Notes:
- The initial acquisition announcement did not name the buyer, referring only to a “private equity group.”[1] Revelstoke’s portfolio listing provides the identifying confirmation that the buyer/sponsor is **Revelstoke Capital Partners**.[5]

Sources:
1. https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/emerging-trends-in-the-med-spa-industry-viper-partners-insightful-advisory-on-evolve-med-spa-transition-302108307.html
2. https://healthcare.levinassociates.com/2025/05/22/revelstoke-capital-partners-recapitalizes-aom-infusion-strategic-investment-in-high-growth-specialty-infusion-market/
3. https://healthcaredealflow.com/evolve-med-spa-acquired-by-pe-firm/
4. https://media.mcguirewoods.com/publications/2023/Private-Equity-in-Healthcare.pdf
5. https://www.revelstokecapital.com/investments/


(Results from Perplexity sonar-pro)"
    }
  ],
  "isError": false
}

input.query: Evolve Med Spa employee count 2024 Hoboken NJ Revelstoke Capital Partners staff size workforce

content.content:
{
  "content": [
    {
      "type": "text",
      "text": "Evolve Med Spa’s workforce in 2024 appears to be in the roughly 70–100 range, with third-party company databases listing about 70 employees and growth trackers estimating around 96 employees; its headquarters is in Hoboken, NJ, and the company is a portfolio investment of Revelstoke Capital Partners.[3][1][4]

Key points
- Evolve Med Spa employee count:
  - ZoomInfo lists “has 70 employees” tied to its Hoboken, NJ corporate office profile (data page dated 2024), which typically reflects directory-matched staff rather than total frontline headcount.[3]
  - Growjo estimates 96 employees and notes 48% employee growth “last year,” with a May 2025 refresh date; Growjo figures are modeled estimates, not official disclosures.[1]
  - Taken together, these suggest a late-2024 workforce likely between ~70 and ~100 employees, depending on methodology (directory vs. modeled estimate).[3][1]

- Location:
  - Corporate address: 706 Grand St, Hoboken, New Jersey 07030, United States.[3]

- Revelstoke Capital Partners relationship and staff size:
  - Evolve Med Spa is listed in Revelstoke Capital Partners’ investment portfolio, confirming it as a portfolio company.[4]
  - The specific employee count for Revelstoke Capital Partners itself is not stated on the portfolio page; no staff size figure is provided in that source, so a headcount number for the PE firm cannot be verified from this result.[4]

Additional notes
- Job postings around Hoboken, NJ (e.g., NP/PA injector roles) indicate active hiring but do not disclose headcount totals.[5]
- Employee review pages (e.g., Indeed) provide qualitative context but no authoritative total workforce numbers.[2]

If you need a single figure to cite for 2024, use 70 employees with attribution to ZoomInfo (directory-based) or 96 employees with attribution to Growjo (modeled estimate), and specify the source and caveats when reporting.[3][1]

Sources:
1. https://growjo.com/company/Evolve_Med_Spa
2. https://www.indeed.com/cmp/Evolve-Med-Spa
3. https://www.zoominfo.com/pic/evolve-med-spa/529980418
4. https://www.revelstokecapital.com/investments/
5. https://www.indeed.com/q-evolve-med-l-new-york,-ny-jobs.html


(Results from Perplexity sonar-pro)"
    }
  ],
  "isError": false
}
